title: Cant buy a 6300 champ when I have 6383 IP
body: I have enough IP to buy a 6300 champ but it tells me that I don't have enough IP and when I hover over the BUY button for a few seconds it says "Not yet implemented". Does this mean I have to download the old client in order to get 6300 champs?

replies.body:
This may be a sync issue on the updated client.  Returning to the legacy client will fix this up, which does not require a download to perform:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5E6x6pmR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-29T21:33:59.367+0000)
>
> This may be a sync issue on the updated client.  Returning to the legacy client will fix this up, which does not require a download to perform:
>

> -  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

> Let me know if you have any questions!
